name: BlobBoy's Journey
description:
The theme for Ludum Dare 48 was `Deeper and Deeper`, and this is our entry. We are a small team of two, one programmer and one artist and had a lot of fun.

The goal is to get as deep as possible, and maybe find yourself...


Now for some development GIFs, and hope you enjoy to play:

Meet, Blobby! Your faithful companion for all the Game Jams.

Here he was taken back to our artist, he was naughty.

Nah, just kidding:

Here are some finished platform pieces:

Some crystals too!

Thank you for viewing, and hopefully, playing our Ludum Dare 48 entry. See you all next time!
